attributes.action: Reduce immigration into UK and host urgent talks with the EU to ask for help in accomadating those that seek asylum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immigration is clearly swamping our country's facilities... so much so, that it's services are struggling to support it's current citizens. The other EU countries need to do more to accomodate assylum seekers as it seems they all come straight to the UK. How much longer can we sustain this level of growth?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
